channel.title: Computer Games on mattischrome
channel.description: Recent content in Computer Games on mattischrome

item.title: Some more thoughts on Civ 7
item.description: It’s been about 5 months now since the release of Civilisation VII and it’s starting to become a playable game. This is partly due to me getting used to it and partly the effect of quality of life patches and additional features.

item.title: The Lost Guide to CIV VI
item.description: I’ve written some guides about how to play as various leaders in Sid Meier’s Civilization VI, covering Hojo, Alexander, Amanitore, and Qin in his Mandate of Heaven persona. I’m pretty sure I also wrote a guide to Gorgo at some point but all I can find are game screenshots I took one of the times that I played as her.
